details.duties:
• Greets customers and provides excellent customer service.
  • Serves customers, weighs, wraps and affixes price labels to products.
  • Advises customers regarding the content and types of products available.
  • Replenishes supplies and rotates products in the display counter.
  • Take and record temperature of food and food storage areas such as refrigerators and freezers.
  • Replenishes stock on the floor displays.
  • Cleans floors, counters, work tables, trays and equipment.
  • Maintains a safe and clean work area.
details.requirements:
• Good communication skills and ability to read and write in English.
  • Customer Service oriented and able to make good decisions.
  • Able to work under minimal supervision.
  • Able to work in fast-paced environment and have attention to detail.
  • Experience working in meats is considered an asset.
  • Experience working in a grocery store an asset.
  • Need to be available to work flexible shifts including evenings and weekends.

details.duties:
• Greet customers and provide excellent customer service.
  • Stock shelves and display areas.
  • Load carts by operating electric palette jack and bring products out to store shelves.
  • Obtain products from stockroom and brings products out as necessary.
  • Obtain articles for customers from shelf or stockroom.
  • Maintain a safe and clean work area.
details.requirements:
• Good communication skills and ability to read and write in English.
  • Customer Service oriented and able to make good decisions.
  • Able to work under minimal supervision.
  • Able to work in a fast-paced environment and have attention to detail.
  • Experience working in a grocery store an asset.
  • Need to be available to work flexible shifts including evenings and weekends.

details.duties:
• Operates a variety of equipment to load, unload and move materials and products.
  • Picks orders and stock from warehouse.
  • Makes labels and attaches them to goods.
  • Works in a methodical and efficient manner to optimize picking process and meet daily delivery deadlines.
  • Transfers product orders to holding area and wraps goods to prevent spillage, loss or destruction while in transport.
  • Assists others during peak periods and as needed.
details.requirements:
• Forklift certificate and experience working with dollies, hand trucks, pallet lifters, industrial lift trucks and reach trucks.
  • Able to work in cold warehouse environment.
  • Able to read product codes and quantities.
  • Good communication skills and ability to work independently and in a team environment.
  • Needs to possess steel-toed safety boots and work in a safe manner in accordance with company policies.
  • Able to work under minimal supervision.
  • Able to work in fast-paced environment and have attention to detail.
  • Need to be available to work flexible shifts.

details.duties:
• Schedule distribution of goods and maintain internal record-keeping system.
  • Inspect and verify incoming goods against invoices or other documents.
  • Route goods to appropriate storage areas and unpack goods received.
  • Record shortages and reject damaged goods.
details.requirements:
• Experience working in a warehouse or grocery environment using forklifts, pallet trucks and lift trucks.
  • Experience using manual and/or computerized inventory systems.
  • Able to work in chilled and cool areas.
  • Good communication skills and customer service oriented.
  • Able to work in fast-paced environment and have great attention to detail.
  • Able to handle heavy loads and stand for long periods of time.
  • Able to work flexible shifts including evenings and weekends.

details.duties:
• Ensures all departments are ready for business at all times.
  • Lead staff to meet store operational goals, develop positive employee culture through training to ensure quality delivery of customer service.
  • Ensure that all company policies and procedures are followed.
details.requirements:
• Experience working in a supermarket or large retail environment.
  • Post-secondary education and/or experience in merchandising and/or business management.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication, interpersonal and problem-solving skills.
  • Exceptional customer service skills with a talent for building customer loyalty.
  • Strong organizational abilities â€“ able to manage multiple priorities.
  • Able to work in a fast-paced environment.
  • Knowledge of store systems is an asset.
  • Must be available to work flexible shifts including evenings, weekends and holidays.

details.duties:
• Greets customers and provides excellent customer service.
  • Set up and maintain produce display tables by keeping them full, trimmed, tidy and rejecting spoiled merchandise.
  • Load carts with produce in coolers, delivers them to tables and unload produce for display.
  • Ensure the company standards of quality by inspecting and rotating produce.
  • Maintains a safe and clean work area.
details.requirements:
• Good communication skills and ability to read and write in English.
  • Customer Service oriented and able to make good decisions.
  • Able to work under minimal supervision and have attention to detail.
  • Able to work in a fast-paced environment.
  • Good decision making and problem solving skills.
  • Experience working in produce considered an asset.
  • Experience working in a grocery store an asset.
  • Need to be available to work flexible shifts including evenings and weekends.

details.duties:
• Greet customers and provide excellent customer service.
  • Serve customers, weighs, wraps and affixes price labels to products.
  • Advise customers regarding the content and types of products available.
  • Replenish supplies and rotate products in the display counter.
  • Replenish stock on the floor displays.
  • Clean floors, counters, work tables, trays and equipment.
  • Maintain a safe and clean work area.
details.requirements:
• Good communication skills and ability to read and write in English.
  • Customer Service oriented and able to make good decisions.
  • Able to work under minimal supervision.
  • Able to work in fast-paced environment and have attention to detail.
  • Experience working with deli meats and cheeses considered an asset.
  • Experience working in a grocery store an asset.
  • Need to be available to work flexible shifts including evenings and weekends.

details.duties:
• Responsible for handling team members and customer issues when they arise.
  • Supports the department manager in implementing of all department initiatives.
  • Checks deliveries to purchase orders verifying content and ensuring quality and appearance of purchases.
  • Assists with the promotion of special sales in the department, ensuring that a supply of product is on display.
  • Authorizes reduced items.
  • Sets up tables including loading carts with produce in coolers, delivering to tables, unloading produce and creating displays.
  • Assists with the completion of work schedules for staff.
  • Assist customers and merchandise products in display cases and price correctly according to company standards.
details.requirements:
• 1-3 years experience working in a produce department in a large format retail food environment, preferably in an assistant supervisory role.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication, interpersonal and problem-solving skills.
  • Exceptional customer service skills.
  • Able to manage multiple priorities and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
  • Able to operate in changing temperatures on a regular basis.
  • Able to walk & stand for extended periods of time.
  • Need be able to work flexible shifts including evenings, weekends and holidays.
